rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player
adds one mana of any type that land produced.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {G} for each land you control.
{20}, Sacrifice Atine Grojogan: Create Alas-Wali, a legendary 20/20 green Avatar creature token with trample and indestructible.
